org.apache.drill.exec.store

Class StoragePluginsHandlerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.store.StoragePluginsHandlerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoragePluginsHandler

    public class StoragePluginsHandlerService
extends Object
implements StoragePluginsHandler
    Drill plugins handler, which allows to update storage plugins configs from the ConfigConstants.STORAGE_PLUGINS_OVERRIDE_CONF conf file TODO: DRILL-6564: It can be improved with configs versioning and service of creating ConfigConstants.STORAGE_PLUGINS_OVERRIDE_CONF

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoragePluginsHandlerService(DrillbitContext context) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadPlugins(PersistentStore<StoragePluginConfig> persistentStore, StoragePlugins bootstrapPlugins)
      Update incoming storage plugins configs from persistence store if present, otherwise bootstrap plugins configs.

    • Method Detail

      • loadPlugins

        public void loadPlugins(@NotNull
                        PersistentStore<StoragePluginConfig> persistentStore,
                        @Nullable
                        StoragePlugins bootstrapPlugins)
        Description copied from interface: StoragePluginsHandler
        Update incoming storage plugins configs from persistence store if present, otherwise bootstrap plugins configs.
        Specified by:
        loadPlugins in interface StoragePluginsHandler
        Parameters:
        persistentStore - the last storage plugins configs from persistence store
        bootstrapPlugins - bootstrap storage plugins, which are used in case of first Drill start up
